snippet.title: Colors:Zero - Modular Characters
snippet.description:
Modular characters WIP system used in Colors:Zero for generic crowd.
Using Unreal Engine and Character Creator.

Check out :
Trailer : https://youtu.be/fco_UzC9Vz0
Pitch and Produce : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VKek_7D1ZIw

Links :
Website : https://www.colors-zero.com
Unreal Engine : https://www.unrealengine.com
Reallusion : https://www.reallusion.com
Twitter : https://twitter.com/ColorsZeroGame
Subscribe : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbKZY3o4vZmnm0mI6VqcFeQ

#ColorsZero  #CharacterCreator #UnrealEngine
